text: Welcome to our TOEIC vocabulary lesson!
Today we will learn essential TOEIC words.
First word is 'achieve' meaning to accomplish something.
Example: We achieved our sales target this quarter.
Next word is 'acquire' meaning to obtain or get.
Example: The company acquired three new subsidiaries.
Example: The administration building is on the third floor.
Fourth word is 'advance' meaning to move forward.
Example: Technology continues to advance rapidly.
Fifth word is 'agenda' meaning a list of items.
Example: The meeting agenda includes budget discussion.
These words are essential for TOEIC success.
Practice regularly to improve your TOEIC score.
Thank you for studying TOEIC vocabulary with us!
